meanings.definition: A type of tree native to tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The wicopies stood tall in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The villagers enjoyed the shade of the wicopies tree.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys played hide-and-seek among the wicopies trees.
meanings.sent4: The wicopies tree was a green umbrella in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The wicopies tree's leaves rustled in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The edible fruit of the wicopies tree.
meanings.sent1: The children picked ripe wicopies from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The market sold fresh wicopies for a tasty treat.
meanings.sent3: The chef made a delicious pie with wicopies fruit.
meanings.sent4: The wicopies fruit burst with sweet juice.
meanings.sent5: The wicopies fruit was a colorful addition to the salad.

meanings.definition: The act of planting wicopies trees in a garden.
meanings.sent1: The gardeners worked hard to wicopies the garden.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to plant wicopies trees.
meanings.sent3: The wicopies planting event was a fun day out.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with newly wicopies trees.
meanings.sent5: The wicopies planting brought life to the garden.
